mapper.select: select no, dong, apartmentName, aptCode, dealAmount, buildYear, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor, lat, lng, jibun from housedeal join houseinfo using(aptCode) where dongCode = (select distinct dongCode from dongcode where dongName = #{dong} LIMIT 1)

select no, dong, apartmentName, aptCode, dealAmount, buildYear, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor, lat, lng, jibun from housedeal join houseinfo using(aptCode) where apartmentName like CONCAT('%', #{aptName}, '%')

SELECT no, dong, apartmentName, aptCode, dealAmount, buildYear, dealYear, dealMonth, dealDay, area, floor, lat, lng, jibun FROM housedeal JOIN houseinfo USING (aptCode) WHERE dongCode = (SELECT DISTINCT dongCode FROM dongcode WHERE sidoName = #{sido} AND gugunName = #{gugun} AND dongName = #{dong}) AND dealYear = #{year} AND dealMonth = #{month}
